description:
The bright sweetness of raspberries paired with the zing of lemons and buttery smooth macadamia nuts. Having solved the energy chew, Skratch Labs set their sights on creating an energy bar that tastes like a coffee shop cookie but delivers the fuel your body needs, and is easy to digest too.

  • Plant-based ingredients allow for fast absorption and easy digestion
  • 100% non-GMO ingredients
  • 50% less sugar than the average energy bar
  • Ingredients: nut and seed butter blend (cashew butter [cashews, safflower or sunflower oil], tahini), oats, tapioca syrup solids, coconut nectar, tapioca syrup, macadamia nuts, dairy free white chips (sugar, palm kernel oil, natural flavour, sunflower lecithin, salt), candied lemon peel (lemon peel, sugar, citric acid), vegetable glycerine, brown rice crisps, quinoa crisps, dried raspberries, raspberry powder, oat flour, sorghum flakes, sunflower lecithin, sea salt, natural lemon flavour
  • Allergens: tree nuts (cashews, macadamia, coconut)
name: Skratch Labs Energy Bar Raspberries and Lemon
